attributes.action: demand a free assembly for the pepole of cornwall
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: demand a free assembly for the pepole of cornwall and the acknowlede as a duchy and a free country as stated by King henry he 8th and queen elizibeth the 1st.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
